product_name: Hincapie Sportswear Arenberg Leg Warmers - Men's
long_description: The men's Hincapie Arenberg Leg Warmers provide thermal insulation and revolutionary 2-sided silicone grippers that keep the warmers on your legs and in contact with your bike shorts. Soft, supple elastic-knit fabric insulates and wicks moisture away from the body. Fleece-lined HyperOptic Roubaix(TM) fabric provides excellent visibility on the road while staying flexible and comfortable. Soft SlipNot(TM) 2-sided silicone grippers keep warmers in place and in contact with shorts. Ergonomic, articulated knees fit the body in ride position. Hincapie Arenberg Leg Warmers feature lower leg grippers and an auto-locking zippered opening for easy on/off.
short_description: The men's Hincapie Arenberg Leg Warmers provide thermal insulation and revolutionary 2-sided silicone grippers that keep the warmers on your legs and in contact with your bike shorts.
